1/4/2025,Suspect arrested at police station after molesting woman in San Juan,Sexual Assault,San Juan Area,"MH5H+C3H San Juan, Trinidad and Tobago",San Juan,San Juan - Laventille,Trinidad and Tobago,https://www.facebook.com/tntcrimewatch/posts/pfbid02cNKoY2nRVBUJzWu7X2raDKa67ZB1LPaqhQ9yehoAK1EztTiZ6vWYcHqSxzdiUG7tl,Ian Alleyne Network (Facebook),10.658552,-61.422267,"A 39-year-old man was taken into custody after he allegedly molested his common-law cousin's partner at her apartment in San Juan. The suspect apparently fled the scene empty-handed to avoid capture.",,1675

,Zimba Charles and Miguel Edwards Killed in San Juan First Double Murder of 2026,"Zimba Charles and Miguel Edwards were fatally shot in the rugged terrain of Zion Road, Thunder Hill Circular. Police discovered one victim outside and the other inside a small clay brick shack in a remote area of Sou Sou Lands, San Juan.",Murder,Shooting,2,Murder,1/2/2026,"Zion Road, Thunder Hill Circular, Sou Sou Lands",10.67394,-61.469731,"MGFJ+H4C San Juan, Trinidad and Tobago",San Juan,San Juan - Laventille,Trinidad and Tobago,https://www.facebook.com/tntcrimewatch/posts/pfbid02BALQ2D6u9vDgf5DCRMWmpetm7G6rGrL8EVdf5MRWk9Nc4NoZQh8qaD2TpYt5iatel,Ian Alleyne Network (Facebook),,,,,,
,"Woman, 75, kicked in the back, robbed","A 75-year-old woman of Thomasine Street, Success Village, Laventille, was attacked and robbed while walking along the street on Monday morning around 10 a.m. An unknown male assailant approached her from behind and kicked her in the back, causing her to fall to the ground. The attacker then stole a smartwatch with a blue band valued at $350 before fleeing the scene. The victim sustained injuries from the assault. Police are investigating the incident and searching for the suspect.",Assault,Robbery,1,Assault,1/19/2026,"Thomasine Street, Success Village, Laventille",10.6505623,-61.4884642,"MG26+6JF Port of Spain, Trinidad and Tobago",Port of Spain,Port of Spain,Trinidad,https://trinidadexpress.com/newsextra/woman-75-kicked-in-the-back-robbed/article_dbe5bb84-5eaa-4802-b54f-120b11d54bbc.html,Trinidad Express,,,,,,
,"Woman, 60, robbed of gold chain in Port of Spain","A 60-year-old woman from Morvant was robbed of her gold chain valued at $2,500 at the corner of Queen and Charlotte streets in Port of Spain on Friday, January 24, 2026, around 4 p.m. The suspect, described as a dark-complexioned man of African descent with braided hair wearing a black jersey with orange print and black three-quarter pants, approached the victim from the front and forcibly snatched the gold chain with a gold cross pendant from her neck. After the robbery, the suspect fled through Eastside Plaza and onto George Street, with the victim giving chase but unable to catch him. Police investigations led to the arrest of a suspect from Picton Road, Laventille, later that same day by Corporal Mc Eachnie and officers. The stolen gold chain was recovered and the suspect was taken into custody.",Robbery,,1,Robbery,1/24/2026,Corner of Queen and Charlotte streets,10.651665,-61.50802,"MF2R+MQ9 Port of Spain, Trinidad and Tobago",Port of Spain,Port of Spain,Trinidad,https://trinidadexpress.com/newsextra/woman-60-robbed-of-gold-chain-in-port-of-spain-suspect-arrested/article_edbc481a-1c21-4424-8cc1-c0bafa9ebc9e.html,Trinidad Express,,,,,,
,Woman wounded in shooting (38 years old),"A 38-year-old woman sustained a gunshot injury to her buttock during a revenge attack along Upper Wharf Trace, Maracas on Monday afternoon between 2:45 p.m. and 3:00 p.m. The woman was sitting with Kerwyn Sammerson when a red Nissan Bluebird stopped nearby and a suspect emerged from the front passenger seat armed with a firearm.||The suspect opened fire, striking both the woman and Sammerson. The woman was treated for her gunshot injury at the Eric Williams Medical Sciences Complex. Crime scene investigators recovered five 9mm shell casings at the scene, and the assailant fled the scene.",Shooting,Assault,1,Shooting,2/9/2026,Upper Wharf Trace,10.6741414,-61.4060449,"MHFV+MH4 St Augustine, Trinidad and Tobago",St Augustine,Tunapuna - Piarco,Trinidad,https://trinidadexpress.com/newsextra/bellyez-shot-dead-in-revenge-attack-woman-wounded/article_2ea0d007-75f5-4217-b538-7c403ff1d31f.html,Trinidad Express,,,,,,
,"Woman tied up, robbed in Valsayn North home invasion (55)","A 55-year-old woman was violently attacked during a home invasion and robbery on Cedar Avenue, Valsayn North in the early morning hours of Monday. Three armed men dressed in dark hoodies forced entry through the burglar-proofing on the side of the house between 3 am and 4 am, announcing a robbery at knifepoint. The victim was tied up while the suspects ransacked her home, stealing cash, jewellery, a Samsung phone valued at $3,000, and her metallic grey Honda CR-V valued at approximately $200,000. The suspects fled the scene in the stolen vehicle. Paramedics were called to assist the injured victim at the scene.",Home Invasion,"Assault,Robbery",1,Home Invasion,1/26/2026,"Cedar Avenue, Valsayn North",10.6420578,-61.4251025,"JHRF+RXC San Juan, Trinidad and Tobago",San Juan,San Juan - Laventille,Trinidad,https://trinidadexpress.com/newsextra/woman-tied-up-robbed-in-valsayn-north-home-invasion/article_ad58aaa4-de68-468c-92f0-9c8dee0db484.html,Trinidad Express,,,,,,
,"Woman Thrown to Ground and Robbed of $20,000 Gold Bangles Near Central Bank","A 40-year-old woman was violently robbed of her jewelry while walking along Independence Square South on Wednesday morning. As she crossed Edward Street, a man approached her from behind and attempted to snatch a pair of gold bangles from her wrist. A struggle ensued, during which the victim was thrown to the pavement. The assailant successfully removed the jewelry, valued at $20,000, and fled south toward South Quay. Police are searching for a slim-built man of mixed descent in connection with the attack.",Robbery,"Assault, Theft",1,Robbery,1/14/2026,Independence Square South & Edward Street,10.649454,-61.512734,"JFXP+QWJ Port of Spain, Trinidad and Tobago",Port of Spain,Port of Spain,Trinidad and Tobago,"A violent struggle ensued, during which the woman was thrown to the ground. The suspect eventually succeeded in removing the jewellery and escaped by running south along Edward Street, then turning onto South Quay.  The suspect was described as a man of mixed descent, brown complexion, slim build, with short curly hair, wearing a long-sleeved blue sweater and black three-quarter pants.",Trinidad Express,,,,,,
,Woman steals laptop and purse from Hyatt Regency Hotel,"A woman left her silver Apple MacBook Air laptop, valued at $12,000, and a purse containing bank and identification cards in the lobby of the Hyatt Regency Hotel in Port of Spain while conducting a site visit on Thursday afternoon around 3 p.m. When she returned a short time later, both items were missing without her permission.||Police tracked the stolen laptop to Frederick Street near Rituals, and discovered that one of the stolen bank cards had been used to make an $89 transaction at a clothing store on Frederick Street around 3:30 p.m. CCTV footage from the store showed a woman placing a silver Apple MacBook Air on the counter during a purchase, wearing a black jersey with 'SEXY' written across it, dark blue jeans, brown slippers, a black and red wig, and black glasses.||Police arrested a 42-year-old woman from Caiman Road, St. Joseph in connection with the theft. The stolen items were recovered in her possession, and she is currently detained at the Belmont Police Station.",Theft,,1,Theft,2/5/2026,Hyatt Regency Hotel lobby,10.6504832,-61.5159759,772WMF2M+5J,Port of Spain,Port of Spain,Trinidad,https://trinidadexpress.com/newsextra/woman-in-sexy-top-steals-laptop-from-hyatt/article_becab0d4-bbf3-4c27-b177-145cf2d5e85f.html,Trinidad Express,,,,,,
,"Woman slain in front of home (Kellyann Lemessy, 38)","Rio Claro mother and freelance journalist Kellyann Lemessy, 38, was ambushed and fatally shot in her car as she arrived home just after noon on January 22. Two masked gunmen opened fire as she pulled into the driveway of her rental apartment along Naparima Mayaro Road, shooting her multiple times to the head and body. Her toddler (almost two years old) and nine-year-old daughter were in the vehicle at the time but were not injured; Lemessy reportedly shielded her baby from the gunfire. She was pronounced dead at the scene with bullet holes visible in both the front passenger-side and driver-side windows. Police recovered a stolen white wagon believed to have been used as the getaway vehicle, which was found abandoned nearby and had been reported stolen during a home invasion in Penal on January 13. Homicide detectives and crime scene investigators are continuing investigations to determine the motive.",Murder,Shooting,1,Murder,1/22/2026,"Naparima Mayaro Road, near Lazzari Road, rental apartment driveway",10.299585,-61.217495,"7QXM+R2J Rio Claro, Trinidad and Tobago",Rio Claro,Mayaro - Rio Claro,Trinidad,https://www.cnc3.co.tt/woman-slain-in-front/?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=woman-slain-in-front,CNC 3,,,,,,
,Woman Shot in Malick After Falling Victim to Fraudulent Facebook Car Advertisement,"A 20-year-old woman and a 28-year-old man were ambushed in Malick while attempting to purchase a vehicle advertised on Facebook by an individual using a pseudonym. Upon arriving at the meeting location on Valley Drive, a gunman approached and opened fire on their vehicle as they attempted to escape. The woman sustained a gunshot wound to the buttocks and was transported to the hospital for treatment.",Robbery,"Assault, Shooting",2,Robbery,1/12/2026,"Valley Drive, Upper 6th Avenue, Malick",10.660067,-61.461557,"MG6Q+29G San Juan, Trinidad and Tobago",San Juan,San Juan - Laventille,Trinidad and Tobago,https://www.facebook.com/djsheriff3/posts/pfbid0MPnkJnYhG6vdxqnVoPkzUoEeYqLHFCv8qeCcM4J31kG8b5DQj6LpDbtHBCKVpNFLl,DJ Sheriff (Facebook),,,,,,
,"Woman shot dead in Arouca (Yamerlis Lopez, 27)","Yamerlis Lopez, 27, was gunned down while sitting under a shed at Garden Road, Windy Hill, Arouca on January 21. Initial reports indicated that Lopez was pregnant at the time of the shooting; however, post-mortem results refuted this.||Police suspect the killing arose from a dispute. A 27-year-old man has been charged with her murder following instructions from the Director of Public Prosecutions.",Murder,Shooting,1,Murder,1/21/2026,Garden Road,10.637531,-61.323635,"JMQG+2G9 Arouca, Trinidad and Tobago",Arouca,Tunapuna - Piarco,Trinidad,https://newsday.co.tt/2026/01/21/pregnant-woman-shot-dead/,Newsday,,,,,,
,Woman sexually assaulted near plantain field (35),"A 35-year-old woman from the Guayaguayare area was sexually assaulted in the early hours of Saturday morning along the Naparima Mayaro Road in Poole Village. She had been socialising earlier in the day and was dropped off at San Pedro Junction by an unknown man, after which she began walking west along the roadway. While stopped near a plantain field to urinate, she was suddenly attacked from behind by an unknown assailant who sexually assaulted her.||The victim managed to fight off her attacker and continued walking. The same man then followed her, wearing a white jersey and armed with a knife with a green handle. He grabbed her hand and threatened her, warning her not to attempt to stop any passing vehicles.||Her ordeal ended when a passing motorist noticed the suspicious interaction and stopped to help. The woman indicated she needed assistance, and the suspect immediately fled, running beneath a bridge and into nearby bushes. Rio Claro police are investigating the incident.",Sexual Assault,,1,Sexual Assault,2/6/2026,"Naparima Mayaro Road, near plantain field, Poole Village",10.2994002,-61.2328306,"7QX8+QV7 Poole, Trinidad and Tobago",Poole,Mayaro - Rio Claro,Trinidad,https://www.facebook.com/tntcrimewatch/posts/pfbid02oU9PaaFC7hAWyMXDyqdLhMoJpkMD26EjbDKRwKFohGddw9SES1y7usvdbmQ7u7JWl,Ian Alleyne Network (Facebook),,,,,,
,Woman sexually assaulted during J'Ouvert celebrations (34-year-old),"A 34-year-old woman from Diego Martin reported being sexually assaulted while participating in J'Ouvert celebrations on Tragarete Road in the vicinity of the Ministry of Agriculture building on Monday morning around 9:08 AM. According to reports, a male individual approached the victim from behind and engaged in alleged non-consensual sexual contact while dancing.||The victim immediately pushed the suspect away as he attempted to leave the area. Security personnel with the J'Ouvert band intervened promptly, detained the suspect, and handed him over to responding police officers.||The victim positively identified the individual, who was taken into custody at the St Clair Police Station for investigation.",Sexual Assault,,1,Sexual Assault,2/16/2026,"Tragarete Road, vicinity of the Ministry of Agriculture building",10.6623772,-61.5194146,"MF6J+X64 Port of Spain, Trinidad and Tobago",Port of Spain,Port of Spain,Trinidad,https://www.cnc3.co.tt/teen-killed-two-shot-during-jouvert-revelry/?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=teen-killed-two-shot-during-jouvert-revelry,CNC 3,,,,,,
,Woman sexually assaulted after being taken to apartment (25),"A 25-year-old woman boarded a dark blue Mercedes Benz along Southern Main Road, Marabella around 5:30 AM on early Saturday morning, intending to travel to Port of Spain. The driver, described as strong-built, approximately 5 feet 7 inches tall, wearing a black t-shirt and khaki long pants, allegedly diverted her to an unknown apartment building in a residential area instead. ||At the residence, the suspect allegedly forced the woman to engage in sexual intercourse against her will. The victim reported the assault to the San Fernando CID and underwent a medical examination at Princes Town Health Facility, where a medical report was obtained. ||Officers attempted to locate the apartment but were unable to identify it due to the victim's unfamiliarity with the area; investigations are ongoing.",Sexual Assault,,1,Sexual Assault,1/31/2026,"Southern Main Road, Marabella (pickup location); unknown apartment building (assault location)",10.2994122,-61.4511196,"7GXX+QH6 San Fernando, Trinidad and Tobago",San Fernando,San Fernando,Trinidad,https://trinidadexpress.com/newsextra/woman-gets-into-benz-taken-to-apartment-sexually-assaulted/article_53c6532e-7d66-45d4-974b-4b58219513ee.html,Trinidad Express,,,,,,
,Woman robbed of gold chain in daylight incident on Charlotte Street,"A woman from Maraval was robbed of a gold chain during a daylight robbery on Charlotte Street, Port of Spain on February 2, 2026, at approximately 3:54 p.m. The victim was walking on the western side of Charlotte Street near the Maraval taxi stand when she was approached by a slim-built man of African descent, approximately 5 feet 6 inches tall, wearing dark clothing and short afro hairstyle.||The suspect approached the woman and demanded her property, then forcibly grabbed a Franko-link gold chain with a turquoise stone pendant valued at approximately TT$4,800 from her person. The victim attempted to pursue the suspect, but he escaped by running east along Duke Street.||Police are investigating the robbery. The suspect remains at large.",Robbery,,1,Robbery,2/2/2026,"Charlotte Street, western side near Maraval taxi stand",10.6549408,-61.5078536,"MF3R+XVC Port of Spain, Trinidad and Tobago",Port of Spain,Port of Spain,Trinidad,https://www.facebook.com/tntcrimewatch/posts/pfbid0zRdvyi7Jh5vHHyyRJ3QSHFaPLTFoJrS9L5QXyVmhVnwiQukg6oYctTNNgkmYfos7l,Ian Alleyne Network (Facebook),,,,,,
,Woman robbed of gold chain at Paint Depot (Charlotte Street),"A woman was robbed while walking into her workplace at Paint Depot, located at the corner of Duke and Charlotte Street, on Wednesday morning around 8:10 a.m. A slim-built man of African descent with short afro hair, wearing a black T-shirt, black long pants, and slippers, snatched her gold chain with a heart-shaped pendant valued at $8,000.||The suspect fled along Charlotte Street immediately after the robbery.||Officers of the Central Police Station are investigating the incident.",Robbery,,1,Robbery,2/4/2026,"Charlotte Street at Duke Street, Paint Depot",10.6550331,-61.5081605,"MF4R+2P8 Port of Spain, Trinidad and Tobago",Port of Spain,Port of Spain,Trinidad,https://trinidadexpress.com/newsextra/multiple-street-robberies-on-charlotte-street-port-of-spain/article_72a5eb1a-cd4a-427b-a037-9817498affaa.html,Trinidad Express,,,,,,
